description: Purchase office furniture for Denwood AB.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01016852
* **Procurement Number**: W3915-23-0039
* **Publication Date**: December 12, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: Expired - January 12, 2023, 17:00:00

#### Description of Requirement

This [Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/12/abcc1ee462b99367ea679dc95403e46b/ws_annexe_e_-_ias_standard_fr_final.zip) announces an Invitation to Bid (ITB) for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Denwood, Alberta (DND).

The Supplies required include:

* Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
* Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products
* Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
* Support Space – Collaborative Furniture

#### Important Links

* [This Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/12/abcc1ee462b99367ea679dc95403e46b/ws_annexe_e_-_ias_standard_fr_final.zip)
* [Procedures](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/f0a0e9898b1a77cb4b541d65d9125bb8/amend4_ws_annex_e_standard_rfb_template_fr_final.zip)

#### Contact Information

* Name: Edgar, Kathy
* Title: Purchase Specialist
* Phone: 613-541-5010
* Email: [Kathy.Edgar@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Kathy.Edgar@forces.gc.ca)
* Organization: Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Trade Agreements

This requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chilli Free Trade Agreement

The rewritten entry only contains necessary information and has been condensed to fit within the word limit. Output is in nice
